references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Ordinary Differential Equations (NODEs), a fundamental model used as the backbone for the proposed TREAT model in this paper.

references.paper_title: Latent Ordinary Differential Equations for Irregularly-sampled Time Series
references.reason: This paper presents Latent ODEs, a key model compared against in the paper, highlighting its importance in the field of dynamical system modeling.
This paper introduces Hamiltonian Neural Networks (HNNs), another key model compared in the paper, which is known for its high-precision modeling in energy-conservative systems.

references.paper_title: Neural Relational Inference for Interacting Systems
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Relational Inference, a foundational model that forms the basis for modeling interacting systems in this work.

references.paper_title: Time-reversal symmetry in dynamical systems: a survey
references.reason: This survey paper provides the theoretical foundation for the concept of Time-Reversal Symmetry (TRS), which is central to the novel regularization technique presented in this paper.
